name: <io::error::Error as core::convert::From<alloc_crate::collections::TryReserveError>>::from

core::convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.

doc:
Converts `TryReserveError` to an error with [`ErrorKind::OutOfMemory`].

 `TryReserveError` won't be available as the error `source()`,
 but this may change in the future.
